info.name: Mashable [Mobile] - Fixed width
info.description:
To those of you who think Mashable (mashable.com) is too messy, you should try out Mashable for mobile (m.mashable.com). Problem is, it's too damn wide! Here's a userstyle to make it at 800px width. Also changes the story borders to not be double.
Tested only in Google Chrome.
